Empath looks innocently at him.  <It's not my fault you're 
hypersensitive,> she points out in his head.  <Most people don't 
notice me at all until I speak directly to them.>  Her mental tone 
grows threatening:  <I'm not to be trifled with.  I could easily turn 
any weapon in this room on you - including your own!  I know 
Galvatron won't condone an attack on me - I can't say the same for 
you.>

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Cygnar::
>        He glances between Empath and Galvatron.  He sighs and turns 
to face 
> Empath.  "Stay out of my mind.  Or it will be most unpleasant for 
you.  
> Okay?"  He winks condescendingly.  He concentrates solely on hatred 
for her 
> and mumbles something about bloody telepaths.
